name: @graphistry/falcor-query-syntax
description: ES6 Template String and Builder function for Creating Falcor Paths (Experimental)

scripts.build-paths: pegjs -o lib/paths-parser.peg.js --format umd peg/paths-parser.peg && java -jar compiler/closure-compiler-v20160822.jar --js_output_file=lib/paths-parser.js lib/paths-parser.peg.js && rimraf lib/paths-parser.peg.js
scripts.build-route: pegjs -o lib/route-parser.peg.js --format umd peg/route-parser.peg && java -jar compiler/closure-compiler-v20160822.jar --js_output_file=lib/route-parser.js lib/route-parser.peg.js && rimraf lib/route-parser.peg.js
